JobFullDesc: This is a new role created to help Dell prepare for mandatory ESG reporting.  We are looking for someone with a strong financial reporting and internal control background to help us build out our knowledge base of relevant ESG reporting issues and questions and to help us navigate the many, and rapidly changing, global reporting requirements.ESG Financial Reporting ConsultantWe are a global, multi-billion-dollar corporation – and Accounting is vital to reflecting our staggering earnings, profits, cash balances and other financial results. To meet this challenge, we implement best practices, provide general financial support, resolve queries, prepare reports and provide statistics. We also design policies and procedures that adhere to audit standards and conform to FASB and SEC guidance, as well as compliance with GAAP and Sarbanes-Oxley section 404.Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as an ESG Financial Reporting Consultant on our Global Policy, Technical Accounting & SEC Reporting team.What you’ll achieveThis is a new role created to help Dell prepare for mandatory ESG reporting.  We are looking for someone with a strong financial reporting and internal control background to help us build out our knowledge base of relevant ESG reporting issues and questions and to help us navigate the many, and rapidly changing, global reporting requirements.  As ESG Financial Reporting Consultant, you will work with the SEC Reporting, Accounting Policy, Internal Audit and ESG Reporting teams to:Perform a global assessment of ESG reporting requirements and ensure consistencyReview existing processes, policies and controls and strengthen to develop SOX-level controlsHelp build the path to integrated financial reportingDevelop relevant ESG knowledge and establish maintenance processEducate management on fundamental ESG questions and key reporting considerationsRepresent Dell’s SEC reporting team on Dell’s ESG interlock teamReview voluntary ESG reportsTake the first step towards your dream careerEvery Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table.
